title: Traits and Features
content: t form, your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming Resistance and Immunity to non-magical damage. Circle of the Moon (Lvl 6 Druid Subclass) Thought Shield: Psychic Resistance Subclass Feature An elder brain shields your brain. You gain Resistance to Psychic damage. The Great Old One (Lvl 10 Warlock Subclass) Thought Shield: Psychic Reflection Subclass Feature Your patron doesn't appreciate attempts to attack your mind.
